basis: The user repeatedly expresses readiness and provides detailed plans, but there is no strong evidence of consistent follow-through in past messages. This suggests moderate intent with a real risk of partial execution; action around the mid-range (â‰ˆ3.0) is plausible.
coaching_notes: UsePrompt strategies: set micro-goals, brief daily check-ins, and lightweight reminders (e.g., 1-tap logs, automated post-meal reflections). Build accountability (e.g., brief progress share or buddy check-ins) and schedule logging into existing routines to reduce cognitive load. If heavy logging feels burdensome, further reduce prompts and rely on the No Snack Today option and a single-line reflection to maintain sustainability.
